snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『キラキラスターナイトexa』| KIRA KIRA STAR NIGHT exa for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
KIRA KIRA STAR NIGHT exa for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1
Genre: Action
Monitor: Horizontal (Recommended), Vertical
Languages: English, Japanese

FEATURES

3 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
Select from 3 unique characters who have different jump attributes 

2 PLAY MODES
Choose from a mode for novices and one for veterans. Go for the stars & get the high score!

CHIPTUNE SOUNDTRACK 
Composed by master musicians, Yuzo Koshiro, Manami Matsumae, Manabu Namiki and more!

BEYOND THE HARDWARE
No slowdown or other graphics limitations!

1 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE – more than three times as fast as the original version
Maximum Performance! Play like you’re meant to. Never miss a jump again.

OPERATE IN LANDSCAPE OR PORTRAIT
Works in either screen orientation (vertical or horizontal).

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3FcrnEo
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
ジャンプアクション
『キラキラスターナイトexa』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/4bxdexs
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 40 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA
